original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3266)@</color>高速迴轉手中的武器，快速橫掃周圍的敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3266)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成四次物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3266)@</color> Swivel the weapon in your hand at high speed, quickly sweep the surrounding enemies, with <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Str(3266)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts four physical damage to the enemy.
